TopicTitle: [0.22] B9 Aerospace Pack / R4.0c / New pods, IVAs, engines, fuselages & structures

Articles.Content: you have my gratitude. great job you two

WOOHOOO!

thanks so much! cant wait to see the new part!!!

(hahaha 5min d/l time it what it says...I have perty fast net connection)
Gorgeous mod, thanks guys!
Thank youuuuuuuuu! I really apreciate your work! so much that i stoped playing KSP for not having this mod! really, and as always awesome job!

Awesome job man! Thanks for working hard on this update and taking time to perfect it. Your skill and dedication really show in your work. And I really appreciate you not just doing a rush job for the sake of releasing it sooner. I'm Looking forward to following this great pack through the development of KSP.

If your connection to spaceport is slow, use mediafire mirror provided in the first post.

http://www./download/9lpqquqh09b75k5/B9_Aerospace_Pack_R3.zip

Meanwhile:

Here is an album with screenshots of some new parts: http://imgur.com/a/wRtEa#0

And here is an inspirational album (some of the crafts there are included with the mod): http://imgur.com/a/WqjQM#0

Video of S2W cargo hold, just because.

Edited June 2, 2013 by bac9
Great Job! There is one problem I found with it so far though, the MK2 monopropellant tank contains liquid fuel. Just though I'd point that out.

Great Job! There is one problem I found with it so far though, the MK2 monopropellant tank contains liquid fuel. Just though I'd point that out.

Heh. I told bac9 with 175 parts I was certain there would be a part bug.

I am ambivalent about being proved right

Fix should be out soon.
i loaded this up, My boy was so excited, and that made me excited. I built a test stand and started showing him the parts, very impressive guys. Good work and thank you.
Yay! Thank you for releasing the mod Bac9 and Tavarius! This is a glorious day! WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!

Yahoo!!! Downloading new version now and my Kerbals will be space traveling in style soon.

Thank you very much, BAC9!

Good work! But are you sure the cargo hold animation is complicated enough?

I'm sure I saw some gears lying around you could spin, and maybe some flashing lights. Maybe a guy walks out to stop traffic.
MK2 RCS tank fixed, new version is up on spaceport.

Sorry to rain on your parade, but I found another bug. If you place a saber S precooler, remove it, and then Ctrl Z to put it back on it reverts it to the saber M precooler. Not that big of an issue but I suspect it could be if you had a really complex craft. I'll see if this happens with other saber parts.
Just spaceport? Or Mediafire too?
If someone is good at making planes,unlike me, it would be amazing if you could make a 727 inspired plane with the new pod engines, and such
It turns out that the saber S precooler turns into a M precooler on launch too. That is sort of a big problem. Oh well, I'll just remove it. I guess it is supposed to be a useless knockoff.
I can't even place the Sabre S precooler in symmetry. It clips badly.

Vastly improved thrust vectoring module that takes into account all engines present on aircraft at once and controls each independently, allowing thrust vectoring to be used to assist in roll maneuvers (!!!) and overall improving stability and efficiency of thrust vectoring engines. Everything also returns to the neutral state upon thrust vectoring switch off, instead of getting stuck in the last position.

The new parts are pretty and all, no question, but I want to know more about this feature. How does it do with space shuttle style asymmetric mass? I assume all engines on a given craft need the same plugin installed.
Love it.
I encountered a problem with crafts. If I attempt to use any of them, I see this:
I'm really liking the info drive! being able to see what each action group does is awesome! I actually mentioned that somewhere and it's awesome to see it in-game.

I encountered a problem with crafts. If I attempt to use any of them, I see this:

Im getting the same issue you are, but i noticed that i only download 83 parts. Anyone know about that?
Im having a issue, Its not downloading the whole mod for me.

If someone is good at making planes,unlike me, it would be amazing if you could make a 727 inspired plane with the new pod engines, and such

My first go at the 727. Wait until you're nearly at the end of the runway before nose up. She's built like a steakhouse and flies like a... brick but still surprisingly stable. Landing's a bit tricky.

Enjoy!
